the "[93mlimitation[0m" is [93mdue[0m to the [93minertness[0m of [93mligand[0m-to-[93mmetal[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mtransfer[0m ([93mLMCT[0m) [93moriginating[0m from the [93m4f[0m [93melectron[0m [93mshielding[0m [93meffect[0m, [93mhigh[0m [93mionization[0m [93menergies[0m, and [93mlow[0m [93melectron[0m [93maffinities[0m. [93mIntroducing[0m [93melectron[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mactive[0m [93mcomponents[0m, [93macting[0m as [93mnanorelays[0m, into [93mLn[0m-[93mMOF[0m [93mpores[0m [93moffers[0m a [93mviable[0m [93mstrategy[0m to [93movercome[0m these [93mdrawbacks[0m, [93mthough[0m the [93munderlying[0m [93mmechanisms[0m [93mremain[0m to be [93melucidated[0m. [93mHerein[0m, the [93mmechanistic[0m [91mpathway[0m [93munderlying[0m [93mefficient[0m [93mphotocatalytic[0m [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m [93mconversion[0m in the [93mB[0m [93m12[0m [93mH[0m [93m12[0m @[93mTb[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mMOF[0m [93mcomposite[0m is [93melucidated[0m, [93mwherein[0m the [93melectron[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mcloso[0m-[[93mB[0m [93m12[0m [93mH[0m [93m12[0m ] [93m2[0m- [93mserves[0m as the [93mcounteranion[0m and [93mfunctions[0m within the [93mpores[0m as an [93melectron[0m [93mnanorelay[0m. In [93msitu[0m and [93mtransient[0m [93mtechniques[0m, [93mtogether[0m with [93mtheoretical[0m [93mcalculation[0m, [93muncovered[0m the [93mserial[0m [93mmechanism[0m, [93mincluding[0m how [93mcloso[0m-[[93mB[0m [93m12[0m [93mH[0m [93m12[0m ] [93m2[0m- [93mnanorelay[0m [93mfacilitates[0m a [93mradical[0m-[93massisted[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m and [93msubsequently[0m [93mimproves[0m [93mLMCT[0m within [93mLn[0m-[93mMOF[0m, as [93mwell[0m as how [93mTb[0m [93m3[0m+ [93mserves[0m as the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactive[0m [93mcenter[0m for the [93mintermediate[0m [93mprocess[0m [91mpathways[0m of [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m [93mmolecules[0m. - [93mPhotochemical[0m [93mSelf[0m-[93mTransformation[0m [93mApproach[0m for [92mConstructing[0m [93mCopper[0m-[93mSelenide[0m [93mNanoclusters[0m.: [93mCopper[0m [93mnanoclusters[0m are [93mgarnering[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mscientific[0m [93minterest[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mdistinctive[0m [93mstructural[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m, [93mtunable[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mband[0m [93mstructures[0m, and [93mdistinct[0m [93mphysicochemical[0m [93mproperties[0m. It is [93mimperative[0m in [93mcontemporary[0m [93mresearch[0m to [93mdevelop[0m [93mcontrollable[0m and [93mefficient[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mfacilitate[0m the [93mformation[0m of the [93munderlying[0m [93mstructures[0m of [93mcopper[0m [93mnanoclusters[0m, [93mparticularly[0m those with [93mdifferent[0m [93mcompositions[0m, [93mstructures[0m, and [93mfunctionalities[0m. [93mReported[0m [93mherein[0m is an [93mapproach[0m [93minvolving[0m the [93mconversion[0m of [93mpreexisting[0m [93mclusters[0m into [93mbinary[0m [93mcopper[0m-[93mselenide[0m [93msemiconductor[0m [93mnanoclusters[0m that [93mexhibit[0m [93mfavorable[0m [93mproperties[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, a [93mCu[0m [93m8[0m [93mcluster[0m [93mcostabilized[0m by [93mbenzyl[0m-[93mfunctionalized[0m [93mselenolate[0m and [93mphosphine[0m [93mligands[0m was [93msynthesized[0m [93musing[0m a [93mone[0m-[93mpot[0m [93mmethod[0m. The [93minsights[0m [93mgained[0m from this [93mstudy[0m [93mregarding[0m [93mphotoradiation[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mself[0m-[93mtransformation[0m [93mcan[0m [93mfacilitate[0m [93mfuture[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mendeavors[0m [93maimed[0m at [93mdeveloping[0m [93mmore[0m [93mprecise[0m and [93mcontrolled[0m [93msynthesis[0m [93mmethodologies[0m for [93mfunctional[0m [93mcopper[0m [93mnanoclusters[0m.
- [93mMultireference[0m [93mEquation[0m-of-[93mMotion[0m-[93mDriven[0m [93mSimilarity[0m [93mRenormalization[0m [93mGroup[0m for [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mPhotoelectron[0m [93mSpectra[0m.: [93mWe[0m [93mformulate[0m and [93mimplement[0m the [93mcore[0m-[93mvalence[0m [93mseparated[0m [93mmultireference[0m [93mequation[0m-of-[93mmotion[0m-[93mdriven[0m [93msimilarity[0m [93mrenormalization[0m [93mgroup[0m [93mmethod[0m ([93mCVS[0m-[93mIP[0m-[93mEOM[0m-[93mDSRG[0m) for [93msimulating[0m [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mphotoelectron[0m [93mspectra[0m ([93mXPS[0m) of [93mstrongly[0m [93mcorrelated[0m [93mmolecular[0m [92msystems[0m. To [93mdemonstrate[0m the [93mapplicability[0m of [93mCVS[0m-[93mIP[0m-[93mEOM[0m-[93mDSRG[0m to [93mstrongly[0m [93mcorrelated[0m [92msystems[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mcompute[0m the [93mpotential[0m [93menergy[0m [93mcurves[0m and [93mvibrationally[0m [93mresolved[0m [93mXPS[0m of [93mN[0m [93m2[0m and [93mCO[0m and the [93mXPS[0m of [93mozone[0m. [93mComparison[0m with [93mexperimental[0m [93mdata[0m and [93mother[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93mtheoretical[0m [93mresults[0m [93mshows[0m that [93mall[0m [93mthree[0m [93mCVS[0m-[93mIP[0m-[93mEOM[0m-[93mDSRG[0m [91mvariants[0m [93maccurately[0m [93mpredict[0m [93mvertical[0m [93mionization[0m [93menergies[0m but only those [93mbased[0m on the [93mDSRG[0m-[93mMRPT3[0m and [93mMR[0m-[93mLDSRG[0m([93m2[0m) [93mlevels[0m of [93mtheory[0m [93mreliably[0m [93mcapture[0m the [93mfull[0m [93mdissociation[0m [93mbehavior[0m and [93mreproduce[0m the [93mexperimental[0m [93mvibrational[0m [93mstructure[0m.
- [93mInvestigating[0m the [93mGround[0m-[93mState[0m and [93mIonization[0m [93mProcesses[0m of [93mHydrogen[0m [93mPeroxide[0m [93mDimers[0m [93mUsing[0m [93mSequentially[0m [95mCombined[0m [93mTheoretical[0m [93mApproaches[0m.: [93mWe[0m [93mpresent[0m a [93mstudy[0m of the [93mstructures[0m and [93mionization[0m [93menergies[0m ([93mIEs[0m) of a [93mseries[0m of [93mconformations[0m of [93mhydrogen[0m [93mperoxide[0m ([93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m ) [93mdimers[0m. [93mGround[0m-[93mstate[0m [93mproperties[0m were [93mcomputed[0m [93musing[0m the [93mcoupled[0m-[93mcluster[0m with [93msingle[0m, [93mdouble[0m, and [93mperturbative[0m [93mtriple[0m [93mexcitations[0m, [93mCCSD[0m([93mT[0m), [93mmethod[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mcorrelation[0m-[93mconsistent[0m [93mbasis[0m [93msets[0m, while the [93mten[0m [93mlowest[0m-[93mlying[0m [93mIEs[0m of the [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m [93mdimer[0m [93mconformations[0m were [93mdetermined[0m through the [93muse[0m of the [93mequation[0m-of-[93mmotion[0m [93mionization[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mcoupled[0m-[93mcluster[0m with [93msingle[0m and [93mdouble[0m [93mexcitations[0m [93mmethod[0m ([93mEOMIP[0m-[93mCCSD[0m) [95mcombined[0m with [93mcorrelation[0m-[93mconsistent[0m [93mbasis[0m [93msets[0m, [93mextrapolation[0m to the [93mcomplete[0m [93mbasis[0m [93mset[0m [93mlimit[0m, and [93mconsideration[0m of [93mcore[0m-[93mcorrelation[0m [93meffects[0m. [93mAll[0m of the [93mstable[0m [93mconformations[0m were [93mdetermined[0m to be within [93m10[0m [93mkJ[0m/[93mmol[0m of the [93mmost[0m [93mstable[0m [93mstructure[0m ([93mconformation[0m [93mI[0m). The [93mfirst[0m [93mIE[0m of [93mconformation[0m [93mI[0m was [93mdetermined[0m to be [93m11[0m.[93m72[0m [93meV[0m, while the [93mcorresponding[0m [93mvalue[0m for [93mconformation[0m [93mV[0m was [93mcalculated[0m as [93m11[0m.[93m58[0m [93meV[0m. This [93mdifference[0m (which was [93malso[0m [93mnoticed[0m for [93mother[0m [93mlow[0m-[93mlying[0m [93mIEs[0m and [93mconformations[0m) [93mmay[0m be [93mhelpful[0m for the [93massignments[0m of [93mexperimental[0m [93mresults[0m. [93mGiven[0m that the [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m [93mclusters[0m were [93mfirst[0m [93misolated[0m through the [93muse[0m of [93mbeam[0m [93mexperiments[0m in the [93mrecent[0m [93myears[0m, it is [93mexpected[0m that the [93mpresent[0m [93mwork[0m [93mcan[0m [93mcall[0m the [93mattention[0m of the [93mcommunity[0m. In [93maddition[0m, the [93muse[0m of the [95mcombined[0m [93mtheoretical[0m [93mapproaches[0m [93memployed[0m [93mregarding[0m the [93mselection[0m of the [93mrelevant[0m [93mconformations[0m and the [93mexploration[0m of the [93mcorresponding[0m [93mionization[0m [93mprocesses[0m for the [93mmolecular[0m [93mclusters[0m [93mmay[0m [93mpresent[0m an [93minitial[0m [93mguide[0m for [93mresearchers[0m [93mventuring[0m into the [93mfield[0m.
- [93mElectronic[0m [93mProperties[0m of SO([93m2[0m) in [93mAqueous[0m [93mNanodroplets[0m from [93mMachine[0m [93mLearning[0m [93mMolecular[0m [93mDynamics[0m and [93mElectron[0m [93mPropagator[0m [93mTheory[0m.: [93mSulfur[0m [93mdioxide[0m (SO [93m2[0m ) [93mplays[0m a [93mcentral[0m [93mrole[0m in [93matmospheric[0m [93mchemistry[0m and is [93mefficiently[0m [93mprocessed[0m in [93maqueous[0m [93maerosols[0m, where [93msolvation[0m [93mprofoundly[0m [93malters[0m its [93mreactivity[0m. [93mWe[0m [95minvestigate[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mproperties[0m of SO [93m2[0m in a [93mseries[0m of [93maqueous[0m [93mnanodroplets[0m [93musing[0m [93mmachine[0m [93mlearning[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93mdynamics[0m [93msimulations[0m [95mcombined[0m with [93melectron[0m [93mpropagator[0m [93mtheory[0m. [93mOur[0m [93msimulations[0m [93mshow[0m a [93mpronounced[0m [93msurface[0m [93mpropensity[0m of SO [93m2[0m and a [93mpreferred[0m [93morientation[0m at the [92minterface[0m with the [93msulfur[0m [93matom[0m [93mdirected[0m [93mtoward[0m the [93mliquid[0m [93mphase[0m. [93mBoth[0m the [93melectron[0m [93maffinity[0m and [93mionization[0m [93menergy[0m [93mexhibit[0m [93mnonmonotonic[0m [93mvariations[0m [93macross[0m the [93mdroplet[0m, [93mreaching[0m [93mextrema[0m at the [92minterface[0m, where [93moxidation[0m is [93mfacilitated[0m and [93mreduction[0m is [93mhindered[0m. These [93mvariations[0m [93mcorrelate[0m [93mstrongly[0m with the [93mlocal[0m [93melectrostatic[0m [93mpotential[0m and [93marise[0m from the [93minterplay[0m between [93mchalcogen[0m-[93mchalcogen[0m and [93mhydrogen[0m-[93mbonding[0m [93minteractions[0m. The [93mresults[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that the SO [93m2[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mproperties[0m at [93maqueous[0m [92minterfaces[0m [93mcannot[0m be [93mdescribed[0m as [93mintermediate[0m between [93mbulk[0m and [93mgas[0m [93mphases[0m and [93mhighlight[0m the [93mkey[0m [93mrole[0m of [93minterfacial[0m [93msolvation[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mredox[0m [93mprocesses[0m in [93matmospheric[0m [93maerosols[0m.
